item.title: Andrea add a quote by Lauren Graham
item.description: "Once again, I've been thwarted by the massive difference between my vision of the successful me and the me I'm currently stuck with." -- Lauren Graham

item.title: Andrea add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Andrea add a quote by David Mamet
item.description: "We must have a pie. Stress cannot exist in the presence of a pie." -- David Mamet

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Rob Sheffield
item.description: "When we die, we will turn into songs, and we will hear each other and remember each other." -- Rob Sheffield

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description: "It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them. " -- Agatha Christie

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Marisha Pessl
item.description: "There might be a Starbucks on every corner and an iPhone at every ear, but donâ€™t worry, people are still fucking crazy." -- Marisha Pessl

item.title: Andrea add a quote by Marisha Pessl
item.description: "We're living longer, we social network alone with our <i>screens</i>, and our depth of feeling gets shallower. Soon it'll be nothing but a tide pool, then a thimble of water, then a <i>micro drop</i>." -- Marisha Pessl
